layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderBlock {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    RenderBody {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584
      RenderBlock (anonymous) at (0,0) size 784x16
        RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 231x16
          text run at (0,0) width 231: "the lower left cell should be colored"
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,16) size 32x48 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 30x46
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 30x20
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 12x20 [bgcolor=#FFFF00] [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              RenderText {#text} at (2,2) size 8x16
                text run at (2,2) width 8: "a"
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (16,2) size 12x20 [bgcolor=#00FFFF] [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              RenderText {#text} at (2,2) size 8x16
                text run at (2,2) width 8: "b"
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,24) size 30x20
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,24) size 12x20 [bgcolor=#FF00FF] [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=1 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              RenderBR {BR} at (2,2) size 0x16
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (16,24) size 12x20 [bgcolor=#088880] [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=1 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              RenderText {#text} at (2,2) size 8x16
                text run at (2,2) width 8: "c"
